name: undecipherable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
unable to be read or understood: The documents were old, fragile and worn, and the handwriting at times was almost undecipherable. She spoke as quickly as she could without her words being undecipherable.
More examplesFewer examplesThe notebook contained 600 pages of undecipherable scribble.Months later a battered envelope arrived, postmarked from some undecipherable place.The law requires any records containing personal information to be shredded, erased, or made undecipherable before they are disposed of.There is an undecipherable complexity to the structure of his business empire.
